title: Unable to connect to the login server
body:
Whenever I try to login, it takes a while before saying "Unable to connect to the login server"."

I've tried everything suggested on the Riot help link. 

Is anyone else having this problem, if so how did you fix it?

replies.body: We believe we've found the cause and are working on rolling out some changes now.
Approximately how long until it gets fix?
Not sure when exactly this will be ready, but I will post back here when we think things are good to go.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Daguava,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UTyIhoA1,comment-id=001900010000,timestamp=2017-07-13T07:33:51.894+0000)
>
> Not sure when exactly this will be ready, but I will post back here when we think things are good to go.

Thanks Daguava.
Can any affected NA and OCE players please let me know if things are better?
Yes. Just got fixed for me :){{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Good to hear, appreciate the confirmation (and patience!)
Fingers crossed, hope you guys can fix it!!!!
U know what I already uninstalled my game and know I need to install it again OMG
I think Kayne broke the game

It's 5 hours ago now since i tried to connect, the problem remain the same... 
Waiting like years on 'Authenticating' and finally come back to the log screen, telling me i can't reach the login queue...

Riot, please, Fix this, we bought skin and so for play, not for wait in front of a login screen...
exact same issue here, c'mon riot its raining and im on break from uni what else am i going to do?

I have accounts on several servers and I live in Japan, and the funny thing is that I can't connect to NA or EUW server, but I CAN login on JP server LOL I really hope this existing problem will be solved soon so I can play with my bae! :p

1. {{champion:17}} BEST CHAMP
same. I'm on vacation/working in Japan right now and I can't connect to the NA servers, but the JP works just fine.
Same. I've tried everything but I can't log in.
We are finishing up the initial rollout of the fix (wrapping up LAN, LAS, and BR now.) If the problem has been fixed for you please let me know.

hi, the login problem was fixed for me, however, since then, i have queued up for 6 games... 4 of which are smooth sailing (but are still broken because champ select issues and summoner spell issues where i can not change what i have selected, but the game is smooth. HOWEVER, the 2 of the 6, i was unable to connect at all, it kept telling me "unable to connect to the server. please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect" yet my internet is perfectly fine.
FIXED! Thx for ur Hard WORK
It has been solved for me, thank u for your hard working
It is good now

There might be a routing issue for some ISPs routing through the west coast while reaching NA.  Help us get a better idea of how you're routing to us by running a traceroute as we get to the bottom of this.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute to 104.160.131.1.  Run it for a few minutes and let me know what you find!
It's definitely the Windows 10 update. Uninstalled it and everything is working again. Pass it on xD
definitely not windows, my macbook cant connect either
I got the same problem I cant log in into the game lol
I got the same issue lol
Interestingly I can log in without any problems if I connect using my wifi data on my phone, the issue only occurs when connected to my home wifi
I uninstalled the most recent windows 10 update but its still not working for me. Just to be sure which update is it?
Same Issue, unable to login after the Windows 10 Update.
same here. Apparently, many of us are experiencing same problem.  Riot gotta solve this problem.
I have the same problem, did any of you do a windows update since then and now?
Yes
yup
Ive tried everything too I keep getting Unable to connect to the login server it was fine last night really annoying hopefully riot fixes this asap should say on oce that they having login issues.

Same issue...it says username or password is incorrect.. and I'm 100% sure they're right. I just logged in to the website!!!
Please fix it.

Never mind its fixed now.. but i got a leave buster and it is NOT my fault..  I was in game .. the internet went down and after about 3 minutes it came back and I tried to reconnect then boom.. an update started while my game was going on and I couldn't play ._.
Just uninstalled the new windows 10 update and it works now.
Still having issues with login. Midwest
Installed the Windows 10 Update over night and trying to log in now and it won't let me on either of my computers with the update. east coast btw.
yes its solved, thanks u so much:D

HERE IS  _**   SOLUTION**_

I am in Hong Kong and experiencing the same issue from morning. However, as someone points out, this is a DNS problem. Thus, I follow the instructions on this page https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues#mq6, more specifically for mac:

Click the Apple icon on the top left of the screen and choose "System Preferences..."
Double-click "Network"
Select the active connection on the left, and click the "Advanced..." button in the lower right hand corner
Click "DNS" from the selection bar.
Remove any current DNS entries, and input the following public DNS servers:
8.8.8.8 
8.8.4.4
Save your changes by selecting "OK"
Apply the changes by clicking "Apply" in the lower right hand corner


And my problem has been solved, please vote this up if it delivers.

Same here, is in Hong Kong, and can't login with every thing tried. Using Mac.
{{champion:32}} {{item:3073}} please
guess I'm not the only one who cannot login into the game lobby, just keep waiting on "Authenticating", then "unable to connect to the login queue" info popped up....
Having problems as well, Rito please fix D':
still waiting for a solution zzz
same i cannot connect to log in queue, anyone able to enter the game again??hope riot solves this.):
still waiting for a solution on this...plss rito fix thiss!
any update on the login error?
I'm having this problem too :(
